definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
(of sb who ostensibly collaborated with the Japanese during the Sino-Japanese war of 1937-1945) to secretly work for the Nationalists or against the Communists

sentences.english: Bezier Line in the Scene View.
sentences.chinese: 在场景视图的贝塞尔曲线。

sentences.english: The biggest accumulating rate occurred around the heading period with a one-peak curve.
sentences.chinese: 增长速率最快时期在抽穗前后，呈单峰型曲线。

sentences.english: We've learned more general things about parametric equations of curves.
sentences.chinese: 我们还了解了，曲线参数方程更一般的性质。

sentences.english: We expect yield curves to steepen significantly over the medium term.
sentences.chinese: 我们预计收益率曲线将在中期显著变陡。

sentences.english: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bzier curves to the current figure.
sentences.chinese: 在当前图形中添加一系列相互连接的立方贝塞尔曲线。

sentences.english: Well, if you look at all these hyperbola's, xy equals constant.
sentences.chinese: 如果你们看这里所有的双曲线的话，xy等于常数。

sentences.english: Helicopters and other VTOL aircraft normally have an avoidance curve.
sentences.chinese: 直升机和其他垂直起降飞机通常避免曲线。

sentences.english: The growth of nestlings of in little egret and pond heron appeared in S curve.
sentences.chinese: 白鹭和池鹭雏鸟的生长表现为S型生长曲线。

sentences.english: For the RN2407, see power derating curves for additional information.
sentences.chinese: 对于RN2407，见权力降额曲线的其他信息。

sentences.english: A more child-friendly liner for the bassinet has been designed.
sentences.chinese: 摇篮曲线设计更加适合婴儿。

sentences.english: You can also provide custom function made of points of cubic bezier curve.
sentences.chinese: 你还可以提供由三次贝塞尔曲线制成的自定义函数。

sentences.english: Light can be trusted to curve only in a vertical plane.
sentences.chinese: 可确信光线仅在垂直面内作曲线传播。

sentences.english: How to use SVM to solve the problem of curve smoothing reconstruction in reverse engineering is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 论文研究用支持向量回归机处理光顺曲线的重构问题。

sentences.english: The discharges of phrenic nerve and the curve of respiration were recorded.
sentences.chinese: 分别记录对照组和模型组大鼠膈神经放电及呼吸曲线。

sentences.english: The deformation and the spreading curve of the work piece were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 同时分析了轧件的变形情况以及宽展曲线等。

sentences.english: Figure 2 Anodic polarization curves of chrome steel samples in simulative mineral slurry.
sentences.chinese: 图2铬钢试样在模拟铜矿浆中的阳极极化曲线。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
to draw the outline of/to outline/to sketch/to delineate contours of/to give a brief account of
broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
to lengthen/to pull sth out longer
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to polish (a written piece)/to qualify or modify (grammar)
